# Svarprosent og deltakere
```{r}
#| label: 'Import data for 4_Svarprosent_'
data_4_Svarprosent_ <- qs::qread('../4_Svarprosent_/data_4_Svarprosent_.qs')
```
```{r}
source("../general_formatting.R", chdir=TRUE)
```

## Hva er din stilling ved skolen?{#sec-Hva-er-din-stilling-ved-skolen--76}


::: {.panel-tabset}

## Tilbyder

::: {#fig-svarprosent-og-deltakere-s-5-fct-cat-plot-html-target}

```{r}
#| fig-height: !expr saros::fig_height_h_barchart(n_y=1, n_cats_y=5, max_chars_cats_y=19, multiplier_per_plot=.2)
plot <-
	makeme(data = data_4_Svarprosent_,
	dep = c(s_5),
	type='cat_plot_html',
	crowd='target',
	mesos_var = params$mesos_var,
	mesos_group = params$mesos_group)
nrange <- stringi::stri_c('N = ', n_range2(plot[[1]]))
link <- make_link(data = plot[[1]]$data)
link_plot <- make_link(data = plot, link_prefix='[PNG](', save_fn = ggsaver, file_suffix = '.png')
x <-  I(paste0(c(nrange, link, link_plot), collapse = ', '))
girafe(plot)
```

`{r} x`.

:::
